summary: This bill, S. 236, amends the Long-Term Leasing Act of 1955. It specifically authorizes leases of up to 99 years for land within the Mashpee Wampanoag Tribe Reservation and land held in trust for the Wampanoag Tribe of Gay Head (Aquinnah). The bill was introduced by Mr. Markey and Ms. Warren and was referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
